subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although the Yankees recovered to beat the Houston Astros, thanks to Mark Teixeira’s two-run double and a shutdown performance by the bullpen, the team’s primary concern was the condition of Masahiro Tanaka.
snippet: Although the Yankees recovered to beat the Houston Astros, thanks to Mark Teixeira’s two-run double and a shutdown performance by the bullpen, the team’s primary concern was the condition of Masahiro Tanaka.
